author: Amal Mohamed
text: As greenhouse gas emissions blanket the Earth, they trap the sun’s heat.This leads to global warming and climate change.The world is now warming faster than at any point in recorded history.#ClimateActionNow #GlobalWarming #ClimateAction @smalimustafa @Pricxl @Eco1stArt #climate

author: Amal Mohamed
text: Accomplishments don’t erase shame, hatred, cruelty... It covers it up, with a creative version of pride and ego. Only restitution, forgiving yourself and others, compassion, repentance and living with dignity will ever erase the past.#ramadhan https://t.co/f00mD4vyl0
